body_html: You can use the tf.py_func() op to register a Python callback with access to the raw tensor values (as a NumPy array). Simply return the arguments after executing your Python code, and it will act as an identity op.
body_text: You can use the tf.py_func() op to register a Python callback with access to the raw tensor values (as a NumPy array). Simply return the arguments after executing your Python code, and it will act as an identity op.
body: You can use the `tf.py_func()` op to register a Python callback with access to the raw tensor values (as a NumPy array). Simply return the arguments after executing your Python code, and it will act as an identity op.
